website_summaries.verdict: An enduring favorite for its high-quality, all-inclusive design. A hands-down winner on all fronts.
pros: Impressive setup boasts everything a child could ask for, from monkey bars and swings to a climbing wall and fort – this jungle gym has it all
Solid and sturdy construction will last for years
Its feature set and overall quality surpasses those of similarly priced models
cons: Assembly can take some time, but both kids and parents agree, the finished product is well worth the effort

website_summaries.verdict: A good set that kids of a wide range of ages can enjoy.
pros: Kids love the crow's nest feature
There are lots of elements on this playset
Slide is 10 feet, which is longer than other sets
Three levels on the clubhouse area
cons: Putting this together is a big project
May be worth it to pay for professional assembly

customer_reviews.title: This swingset has a wonderful design, but the wood is as soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: This swingset has a wonderful design, but the wood is as soft and cheap as it could possibly be. Just placing the screws in split many of the boards, and I doubt the entire assembly will last more than a couple of seasons, because the wood is already disintegrating at all the joints. The entire swingset creaks and rocks, and that's with my not yet 4-year old granddaughter, who weighs 32 pounds, climbing on it. I'd rather spend more money and have really solid lumber, where I know the swingset will last for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this playset
customer_reviews.text: Love this playset. 2 words to the wise... Professional Installation. Wow, this thing took forever to setup. Many of the small boards are soft and splinter easily. Overall though it was a solid buy. At 1/2 the cost of similar units, I won't complain too much. I modified the Swing setup. I didn't like how close the swings were so I drilled my own holes and removed the swing glider. Now my kids have more room between the swings to twist, sway, or whatever they like without being so close. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and shipping experience
customer_reviews.text: This was tough. My first shipment came late and damaged (missed my daughters Birthday). The second replacement shipment also damaged but I was able to put something decent together between the two boxes. Instructions were hard and it took 27 hours for 2-3 people to build. The wood seems a bit weak but It looked great just after putting it together but now a week or two later all the floor boards are buckling and the screws snapped from the pressure. I really wish I had a better experience with this purchase but it was essentially a nightmare and I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: emoz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you study out swingsets at all you’ll find that this particular set gives you the biggest bang for your buck! It’s absolutely cheap quality and you need to take the time to seal it, and assemble carefully and drink wine to suffer through the directions, but really- you get what you pay for- rainbow sets cost 5x as much. Assembly costs as much as the set. For the cost- we are absolutely happy with our purchase. Should you choose to buy through amazon- be prepared for shipping to take a while as it has to be contracted out for delivery and signed for upon arrival. We had an issue with a date change and it was rectified.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality unit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Went together flawlessly. All the supplied hardware is in clearly identified packages and there is a pile of hardware. The predrilled components fit together great. There is a large number of parts in the 4 large boxes. I'd recommend sorting every part by the part # stamped in the corners. I found matching pieces in each of the 4 boxes, so it's an important step. Once that is done it's a simple, but time consuming assembly. 2 full days for me with a helper for a 1/2 day Very happy with the end result. I highly recommend these playsets.
customer_reviews.author: John Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Rust on handles will hurt your child, and these rust alot.
customer_reviews.text: As far as getting the best for your children, this set is ok. It won't last. The handles rust away. The wood is embedded with little orange crazy ants. The wood is soft and easily strips when assemble. It takes a couple days to assemble. My biggest gripe is the metal handles, that's were the kids grab to help climb, and they rust. It's very dangerous. I had to remove them and buy all new plastic handles. And there is alot of handles on this set. Other than that, it has stood up to two hurricanes here in Florida. And every kid that has ever come over loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This set was delivered in 4 HUGE/HEAVY boxes and took about 2 days for 2 adults to put this together. The instructions were "ok" but the parts and pieces were in the bottoms of all the boxes and needed to be well searched for. I'd advise you to have A LOT of space to spread every part/piece out on the lawn/garage and have ample open space as you will need to place the constructed parts aside until the final assembly. It is very sturdy and well constructed, we dug down into the yard to make a rectangle enclosure for the playground and filled it with 5inches of wood-chips then anchored the playground to the ground with long reinforced metal nails.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Perry

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: My only dislike is the lookout balcony. It only has a small opening to get onto it a bit scary and I don’t trust the railing so will try to avoid going on it. It also takes more than 20 hrs to put up. What my daughter and I did was we laid out all the pieces and put them in order and she checked off all the parts from the parts pages so it helped. They start by having you put the swing set parts together, handle bars & ladders etc. But my grand daughter loves it and that’s all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Betty E.

customer_reviews.title: All the kids you know will want to be at your house.
customer_reviews.text: This playground is fantastic! It was tedious to build but the supplies are all very good quality and the manual more or less easy to follow. It’s big enough for an adult to stand up straight on the upper level. My kid is bananas about the 2-person swing, which will work with only one kid as well. It’s very attractive and sturdy enough for adults to play on. Bonus: my kid chooses the playground over the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun and potential for more fun with accessories!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and FIL put this together in 12 hours. We added some accessories like a dinner bell at the doorway, a swing rope instead of the two small swings (we already have a swing set) and some LED solar lights for the ceilings of both levels. I’m looking forward to adding a pulley and bucket to trek toys to the top! Too fun! I wish the monkey bars were a little longer and the swing set a little taller but overall it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Over paid engineers  under paid wood manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know where to start..the quality is so..so seams the hardware is engineered way better than the wood...instructions where good but u will need sockets and drill bits to predrilled holes...sometimes the directions don't say to predrilled holes but if you find yourself about to sink a large bolt in a small piece of wood I would recommend predrilled that piece. I did have one missing piece to the slide but after calling the phone number on the instructions I had the piece I needed in one day..it took me 26hr to complete the project..I had a helper for 90% of the project
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best yard investment
customer_reviews.text: This set with its reddish colored wood, looks phenomenal against our green lawn! We don’t have children but got this for our friends’ children when they come over. Probably the best thing we have purchased for our yard so far. We had it installed by a local contractors just because we aren’t great with assembling etc. Also had it installed before putting in underground sprinklers/new grass so we knew those things wouldn’t be an issue. It’s just a great set that keeps the kids occupied while us grown ups are chatting, gives our friends a bit of a break! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Took forever to assemble but was pretty easy to follow instructions. Definitely not for anybody older than toddlers. The slide bows even when my one year old grand daughter slides down it. Looks super cute but we have to be careful to only let the baby’s play on it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fun options poor durability
customer_reviews.text: The set has great options for the kids, and everyone seems to enjoy it. However two weeks after assembly and the rock wall is already starting to splinter and the finish is wearing off. The boards are thin and it just doesn't seem like it will last very long. Disappointed in the quality of the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This set is not even two years old yet and does not get much wear, when we put it together we noticed the slide is really cheaply made and not sturdy at all, we made a rule no adults on the slide but today a 2 year old got injured. The swings are too close together and my sons leg just got caught in the very poorly made slide. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Superb fort ruined by poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Superb fort ruined by poor instructions. The quality is excellent of the actual fort and the cedar wood used for the pieces. However, the instructions are so atrocious it left us scratching our collective heads with how it should piece together. The facing on the AutoCad drawings was so ambiguous that we routinely had to take pieces off and redo them. Or just leave the big ines and drill new pilot holes. Will never put together again - highly recommend the professional assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & Jennifer Weyna

customer_reviews.title: Girls love. Put on a clear sealant made for cedar
customer_reviews.text: Girls love. Put on a clear sealant made for cedar. Didn't change the look at all. Our friends have this exact model too. Theirs in 8+ and has never been taken care of...still have a couple more years life in it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna E

customer_reviews.title: Need patience and follow thru instructions while assemble
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are very detailed but too many parts and so many different fasteners and screw sizes. Wish it would be simplified and if more parts would come assembled. The instructions had a minor error which was corrected by one in customer service who immediately answered the phone with the corrected answer. Manual recommend 2 adults of a total of 40 hours. We did it in 33 hours. Kids are very happy. Hope they will enjoy it imensly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Moshe

customer_reviews.title: Does not weather well!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying our Grandchildren love this Swingset. After we set it up we did the recommenced extra sealant to the whole set. This year the wood is already cracking in some places and the rock climbing wall is very scratched up and worn from wear and tear of the toddlers that play on it. It just looks bad. I would expect that after several years, but it has not even been up a full year, and we did the protective sealant.
customer_reviews.author: Cari N.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble, patience required!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too long to assemble, it took a Carpenter and an engineer (myself) and over 25 hours to complete. Instructions are not that great and had to reversed parts many times. The wood cracked easily when too much force was applied, and they had way too many different types of screws for the same parts, I am still having nightmares of finding every single screw. Nevertheless, we completed the project and the kids love it. They play on it everyday, it was a big sacrifice of my time, but I believe it was worthed. I believe it will last then for at least the next 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Freckles

customer_reviews.title: They lied about this product it gets mold and cannot be outside
customer_reviews.text: This product is completely unsafe look how it has black mold and we only had it two months and no one from Amazon even helps us this is terrible stay away from this manufacture in this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming effort
customer_reviews.text: This thing is an absolute beast to put together. It took 4 adults a good 10-12 hours to put this thing together from start to finish. The boards are labeled however, in what I assume is an effort to ship in the least amount of boxes possible, they are spread out through all of the boxes. It probably took at least 2 hours to sort through the boards alone! However I feel like the directions were adequate and once it was put together it seems as though it is well made and the kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase
customer_reviews.text: The worst buy I have did, the wood was not real cedar but sprayed to smell and look like cedar. Some holes were not drilled out, some of the wood was delivered cracked and dented or damaged. Most of the screws were not usable and parts were not organized and all scattered in different boxes it was so time consuming in organizing the boards before we could even start assembling the parts. I really wish there was alway to get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Gleason family

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool set and the kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool set and the kids love it. The only thing bad I have to say about it is the hardware for the swings needs updating. If you order this set I would recommend going to a hardware store and getting longer bolts(6"),washers, and lock nuts. That way the lock nuts will sit on top of the swing beam. The hardware they send strip out the threads as soon as you tighten the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Great set, superb customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Great swing set; our neighborhood kids love it. Unfortunately, we did not stake it down as required, and so it was knocked down and heavily damaged in a wind storm. Although our failure to stake the set voided the warranty, the company gave us a very steep discount for the replacement parts and was extremely helpful and efficient throughout the process. We're looking forward to repairing the set and getting back to enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great play set and plan a weekend
customer_reviews.text: Great play set!! Kids love it. I had my 10 yr old daughter and 8 yr old son help me and it took us about 35 hrs to complete. We didn’t use the app for the instructions because I thought it was cheating for them...LOL. Definitely pay attention to the hole locations on all instructions. I had to redo a few steps because I didn’t pay attention to where the pilot holes needed to be. Other than that...put some good music on and start at step #1, you’re going to be spending some time outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great playground for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: I had a great local builder, Almighty Labor Services LLC, build the set. They did a fantastic job and I would highly recommend them. The manufacturer did leave out a few pieces of hardware that my builder was nice enough to replace. The only complaint I have is with the slide. The bars under the slide are about an inch too short. After only a few slides down the bottom most bar fell out because of the inadequate width. I replaced the bar myself and it seems to be fine. Overall A+ still and a great purchase for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K

customer_reviews.title: Survived first winter.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a year now and the play fort has held up very well. It took 6 adults four days to assemble. The wood is very soft so go slow and don’t force anything. It seems to have handled one season of rain and snow quite well as well as five children all under the age of 8.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall kids!
customer_reviews.text: Love this play set! We have had it up for over a year and we love it! A 3 and 7 year old play on this everyday. Both of my boys are tall for their ages which is part of the reason I went with this set and I am glad I did! I am 5’8 and can stand up in the club house. Everything is holding up well and working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great project for friends and family
customer_reviews.text: Even though there were 9,999,999 parts, the instructions were great. Worked with 2 teams, one pulling parts and piecies nd setting in the order of instruction steps and another team putting each step together. 4 people total took us 15 hours to assemble. We went one step farther and added a floor on the bottom. Think the grand kids are going to love playing on this for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great set. It is good quality for the money and my 4 year old daughter absolutely loves it. I ended up putting it together by myself with no help. It took approximately 35 hours to do so, but wasn't very difficult. For the most part the instructions are clear and easy to follow. I had two boards that came with some damage so I called the company and they are shipping two new boards to me at no cost with no questions asked. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Minneapolis

customer_reviews.title: LOVELOVELOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this playset, definitely worth the price! It is beautiful, and well built and perfect for my 3 and 5 year old to use for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Good quality playhouse, but takes forever to put together. There are millions of little pieces of wood that you have tonout together and over 50 different screws. Nuts and bolts, etc. Make sure you have at least one or more helpers and a week to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Hafizullah Ebady

customer_reviews.title: Great playset! Headache to install and some quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Once it’s built it’s a great playset. My problem with it was that the a lot of pre drilled pilot holes were off and had to make our own. Lots of the wood was cracked and chipping forcing me to sand it and restain some of it. I just feel like for the cost of it and the fact that you already have to take a whole weekend to assemble it yourself you should get better quality when shipped
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and 2 babies later
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and 2 babies later we finally got this thing put together. It’s a great swing set and the kids love it, but pay for the assembly! You will NOT regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Plan ahead... lay everything out by part number
customer_reviews.text: It’s so cute, but it has a “billion” pieces/parts. My husband and I did most of the assembly, but we hired someone to level the ground (only where the house-part sits, and to built the second level. Be sure to lay out EVERYTHING before you start.
customer_reviews.author: DLGM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Overall can’t beat the price for this much quality. Of course there was a couple things during installation like a screw here or there missing but enough other extras to make it work. Follow the instructions and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Meise

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome! Make sure you find someone to assemble because ...
customer_reviews.text: This swing set is a lot of pieces! Each board and screw is individual. Took 2 workers 12 hrs for 2 days to assemble. But once it's done, it's awesome! Make sure you find someone to assemble because the Amazon home service way underestimates the assemble costs and no service provider will take the job! So if you are buying it because you think Amazon can find someone to install it you will be disappointed. Otherwise I can't say enough how much my kids love this set!
customer_reviews.author: Layne Petit

customer_reviews.title: nice but complex
customer_reviews.text: item came with all parts, and looks great. Be prepared for a difficult assembly. I am very handy and it took two of us two and a half days to assemble. Four instead of five stars for difficulty of assembly, and the fact that in a few cases it wasn't clear in the instructions which side of the board was to face up early on in the assembly, but the orientation of pre-drilled holes mattered later on after it was nearly too late to fix.
customer_reviews.author: teller

customer_reviews.title: Lots of work!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very handy & it took him over 40 hours to assemble! It’s a great set, but just be prepared for all the pieces & all the work!
customer_reviews.author: Karin F

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: It came in 4 different boxes that were 250 each of you download that app it helps you put it together so far we are very happy with the product we did have a problem with it missing certain pieces but customer service was amazing about sending the piece we needed it is a very good buy
customer_reviews.author: Jordan White

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. My husband did 90 percent of himself. Directions are easy to follow. The company is great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Got ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so mad. I mean SO mad! This thing is breaking after two weeks. Boards bend when the kids stand on them. It’s paper thin wood. Spent $1600 on something that won’t last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this product...its very cheaply made. We don't anticipate this set lasting more than a couple years & were frankly worried about safety concerns with our children & their friends. This was delivered & we elected to pay for the professional installation through Amazon. At first, we were disappointed in their performance (seemingly slow), but we came to realize that this was a very intricate job (lots of pieces) & it was only "billed" as an 8 hour job by Amazon, but is easily a much more involved job. Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A couple defects but overall a nice playset for the money
customer_reviews.text: The only issues I have with this swing set is that the swings are only a couple inches away from each other and pretty dangerous when all three are taken up, the beam needs to be extended a few feet. And the slide needs middle bracing going to the ground because it flexes quite a bit when the kids go down it. Other than that pretty awesome swing set
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her fort
customer_reviews.text: This play set is great. Good price for what you get. The set up and assembly was pretty easy too. Just plant on a few days, follow the instructions, and it will come together well
customer_reviews.author: blacky

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap wood cracks and splits easily
customer_reviews.text: The wood isn’t sturdy at all! I would think they would use a sturdier wood, this wood is so light weight, splits and cracks very easily. Almost seems not safe to use as a kids playground structure. For this amount of money I should have bought better materials and built one from scratch, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: hector amaya

customer_reviews.title: The wood is not sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set 2 years ago. The wood is soft and splits easily. Within a month slats were falling off, climbing mounts were snapping off, and the Eagles nest was losing the rungs. Two years later and I think I just spent 1400.00 on firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Gladwill

customer_reviews.title: Our kids absolutely love this playground
customer_reviews.text: Our kids absolutely love this playground. My one and only complaint is how hard it is to get together. You will need more than two people and multiple days set aside for this project. The end result is great though. Next time though I might just spend the extra and have them build it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Playhouse! Great value! My girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made playhouse. It is very sturdy, and come with high quality lumber and hardware. Word of advice before starting assembly, lay out ALL pieces based on the steps. This will definitely help speed up the assembly process. My only suggestion to the company would be to package the parts together based on assembly. Other than that, NO COMPLAINTS!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J Reed

customer_reviews.title: Took three adults approximately 15 hours to build including time ...
customer_reviews.text: Took three adults approximately 15 hours to build including time to go to the hardware store for missing boards and screws. Time well spent as my grandson LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The right choice for us!
customer_reviews.text: Took us 2 days (18 hours) and two and a half pair of hands to put it together! Instructions are easy to follow. Once you develop a system it goes pretty smooth! But most importantly, our son loves it! The monkey bars are pretty high. We love it! It's big enough to be fun, and good variety of activities for our son. (Helps to have a large yard).
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Making memories💖
customer_reviews.text: The kids are in love with their play set. We have an 8 and 4 year old. We had some friends help with it, it took about a week to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Raquelhawaii

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids, wood splits easily
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and will hopefully get lots of wear out of it. Took a bit longer than I would like to admit to put together, definitely a 2 person job. Was missing a few of the hardware pieces, luckily was able to make due with other pieces. Would splits easily as many others have said. And a few of the wood pieces needed to be shaved down to fit around the clubhouse portion...not sure where the measuring error was there.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Musser

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this playset
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this playset. We were missing a couple parts, but Backyard Discovery was great in sending the pieces out for overnight delivery. Would recommend sorting all of the parts out by part number first, and keep everything organized. This will help assembly go more smoothly. My wife and I assembled this in a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gourley

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed in it
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to put together. The wood is cheap and the slide 100% sucks. After 3 years, high winds came and blew it over while it was properly anchored to ground. I was happy it blew over, now I can get a much better one.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, and my kids love it. Could have been a little easier to out together.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Green

customer_reviews.title: Our grandkids love it and spend a tremendous amount of time on ...
customer_reviews.text: this took about 3 full days and 4 guys to put all together but it was worth it! Our grandkids love it and spend a tremendous amount of time on it!! Super glad we got this for them, it is made very well and will last many, many years! It's expensive but well worth it in the long run!! It will definitely out last us!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Magoon

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you live we’re there’s wind.
customer_reviews.text: Nice play set. Had 20mph wind and blew it over. Completely done.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mary

customer_reviews.title: Once together the player is nice. The instructions can be a bit confusing
customer_reviews.text: Once together the player is nice. The instructions can be a bit confusing, make sure you pay attention to the pictures as the written instructions are lame. The wood seems very soft and dents easily. I am hoping for the small fortune spent the set will last for our youngest who is 3.
customer_reviews.author: Hshdhd

customer_reviews.title: two person job...
customer_reviews.text: Plans are hard to read. Some boards will be warped and you might need to make some adjustments. Over all the kids love it. Lay out all pieces and have your helper lay out the next steps. Took three 12 hr. days for my wife and I.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I wish we spent extra money for a more solid swing set, very disappointed in the quality of the wood. Feels like it’s going to crack.
customer_reviews.author: Fil M

customer_reviews.title: My kids are so excited
customer_reviews.text: Love it! If you buy it, I seriously urge you to think about paying someone to put it together because I did and even like that it tool forever. Amazon home services is a great option to find someone to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma M. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: I hope it lasts a year
customer_reviews.text: Gear up for several days of torturous building. It took 5 adults 4 days to complete the task. Some of the holes are predrilled others are not. Wood is a little cheap.
customer_reviews.author: KoolKidKtMel

customer_reviews.title: Everything comes in multiple boxes prepare to dig per step.
customer_reviews.text: This is all put up. Took 3 days. The kids love it! It looks beautiful. Some pieces of wood came chipped and 1 was split but we managed it. We are ove all happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought on Amazon! My kids loved it and it did not require a doctorate to assemble (though it took the better part of two days). Highly recommend that you lay out the pieces by letter so that when you are constructing they are easy to find. The parts were not packaged in order of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Lots of time to build. But worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the time it takes to build this. And the wood cracks eaisly while putting this together and the stamps to tell what each board is. Are terrible. But the swingset it almost done. I can stand up in it. It looks awesome. And most importantly my child loves it. It is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Kenz12

customer_reviews.title: Do it......
customer_reviews.text: Great swing set for the price! Took me two full days with one other to help. Instructions were easy to read. Take your time to lay everything out in an organized fashion before hand. It will save you time in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Long process but wonderful results. Be patient and have some help ready.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Buy at Sam's for a better value!
customer_reviews.text: A bunch of boards split. Also had some missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Stenberg

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, but looks can be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but looks can be deceiving. It is cheaply made. Thin wood. It has only been up a month and it is already falling apart. All of the boards are splitting. Assembly was difficult with contradictory instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Coral

customer_reviews.title: Great swing set. My twins love it!
customer_reviews.text: Use the BILT app to assemble, but refer to paper instructions when you cannot find parts. Sometimes the app labels parts different.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Playset, Assembly a Bear
customer_reviews.text: The set once assembled is awesome. We have three boys, ages 11, 6 and 5 and all three of them love this playset. We hired an assembly company to put the set together and it took them a weekend (Sat and Sun) to finish. The quality seems good though the true test will be in a year or more as we see how it holds up to Georgia Summers.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Kids love, but will outgrow in 5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Small children love it. Based on thickness of lumber used, the kids will out grow by the age 10 as indicated in literature.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cekovic

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and spent more than a week putting it together. We had a storm and it literally rolled twice and fell apart. I called the company and they won't compensate me in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fort. Check screws periodically.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome product. Have and would recommend to others. After three years, noticed some of the screws had snapped. See picture. Otherwise zero issues from the fort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rough installation but loved overall
customer_reviews.text: Assembly for this was a bit ridiculous. Unclear instructions and lots of fixing what was just built. It took about 38 hours to build. However...that being said. The kids love it. I would just advise anyone to pay for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Brinkerhoff

customer_reviews.title: It takes time but it does have good instructions
customer_reviews.text: it has a lots of parts and it says roughly 20 hours for 2 people to put togeather if youve never done one it takes a lot longer than that and this is my second one now i due glue every board as I put it togeather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his playset!! The only downside is that the slide is only for 3 to 10 year olds. We will be needing to replace it again n the near future so that his cousins will be able to enjoy it with him.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa  M. Szukalski

customer_reviews.title: Not really beefy.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but it's very petite. It's for smaller children. Like up to 5 or 6
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My boys are older and this is an awesome play set as it is very roomy
customer_reviews.text: My boys are older and this is an awesome play set as it is very roomy. They have had lots of fun in the month we have had it. They love playing outside.
customer_reviews.author: T. Felts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very large
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure out your space before buying because it's big! Kids love it and it's high quality. Assembly was time consuming but easy to follow directions. We applied sealant so it should last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: FamilyFirst

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Once everything was sorted by step and page, it was fairly easy to assemble. Organization is the key. It is very sturdy and the kids love it. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: Entry level set.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend having it professionally assembled. Fair quality at best. Wish we would have paid a little more for a better quality set. Our 6 year old is almost to big for the swings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Lay everything out and take your time. Some wood is flimsy but all in all seems like a decent set
customer_reviews.author: robmard

customer_reviews.title: My kids really love the playset however two of the boards came in damaged see pictures below
customer_reviews.text: My kids really love the playset however two of the boards came in damaged see pictures below
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids had a ball on this fort.
customer_reviews.text: Our two grands loved this fort and are playing on it constantly. It was professionally installed over three days by one worker. I would buy it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: ... you def need help putting it together Instruction were great!! Looks beautiful when
customer_reviews.text: A lot of pieces to put together you def need help putting it together Instruction were great !! Looks beautiful when done
customer_reviews.author: asher tesser

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE this set. It was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great playset
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a handyman by any means and assembled literally all by myself in about 3days. Kids love it and high quality. Delivery was very fast and convenient. All round great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Francis

customer_reviews.title: for the price of it I was a little disappointed with it overall
customer_reviews.text: Not really, for the price of it I was a little disappointed with it overall, the birds nest to me is not the safest, I would of taught for something up so high and for kids that the railings would have been a lot sturdier, also I think the slide is terrible, it's way to bumpy in the middle and the kids can't really enjoy it, everything else seems fine, it's a beautiful swing set when assembled just those few things were important for the kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely took a few solid days to assemble but well worth it, our children love it!! A few tips... -go to the dollar store and buy some bins for the hardware -allow your garage to be converted into a storage space for all the boards -DONT SKIP PAGES :)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey P.

customer_reviews.title: Telescope broke off in one week and all that plays ...
customer_reviews.text: Telescope broke off in one week and all that plays with it is my two-year-old
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great playground just a little work to setup :)
customer_reviews.text: Hard to setup but great playground!!!!!!! A box came damaged and i reported that and it was only about 2-3 weeks before we had a replacement box in the mail and that impressed us!
customer_reviews.author: Lordaren

customer_reviews.title: Solo assembly in high heat not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Just about killed me assembling it in the 105 degree heat by myself but all in all it’s a great set. Kids love it and that makes it all worth it. Took 3 solid days nonstop to assemble myself.
customer_reviews.author: Shane G.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the whole set
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the whole set. Pleased with the no shipping charge and the fast arrival of order! My granddaughter was overjoyed with her castle. It is definitely 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great play set
customer_reviews.text: It takes a few days to assemble. But everything is as described. All the children love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could have been a little better for putting it together but our grand children love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Allen

customer_reviews.title: A huge hit!
customer_reviews.text: This playset was difficult to assemble, but the kids at our church absolutely love it. It is a HUGE hit!
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this swing set now that it is put together. I have to say the assembly process was a little ridiculous and some of it could have been together when it arrived. This is a very well designed and put together set. It had everything that we were looking for in a new set for my son. I will say we were not impressed with the stakes to hold it into the ground. The other thing we don't love is the slide is very cheap plastic. It has already started peeling after only a month. Plus it bends and turns with just one person using it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Backyard Discovery Skyfort II All Cedar Wood Swing Set
product_meta.description: This outdoor playset will be the kids' favorite, with its raised clubhouse play fort, wooden roof, gabled entry way and balcony. From the crow's nest, they’ll cast a keen eye to the horizon, then race to the monkey bars and swing set on its three-position swing beam. A solid rock wall and standard ladder will give them healthy climbing fun while a 10' wave slide will zoom them down to start all over again!
feature_bullets: Easy Assembly: Assistance with BILT, a 3D-guided interactive assembly app compatible with any Google or Apple device.
Elevated play: Large, raised clubhouse on the Skyfort II featuring a wooden roof, trimmed windows, a covered upper porch, unique bay windows and a sun deck.
Lower deck: Including snack stand and picnic table as well as a sandbox area.
High flying swings: Two belt swings and a two-person glider provides swinging fun for up to 4 kids at once.
100% Cedar: our cedar wood construction contains a tight knot structure and a natural resistance to decay, rot and mold.
Safe play: Engineered to meet or exceed ASTM standards (code F1148-19). This product is intended for RESIDENTIAL USE ONLY.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars344 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Manufacturer: Backyard Discovery- Leisure Time Products, Inc. - Dropship
